titles.title: Aging Together Act
Aging Together Act
A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to direct resources that promote multigenerational collaboration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Aging Together Act
This bill changes requirements and preferences for certain grants and contracts that support multigenerational and civil engagement projects and other activities for older individuals, such as by expressly expanding eligibility for the grants and contracts to include states and area agencies on aging.
